name: Minority Village and Hamburger Hill Tour 3Days
description: biking ride to Khe Sanh for sightseeing en route, The rock pile, Darkrong bridge, Ho Chi Minh trail. Take lunch then visit Khe Sanh combat base, Lang Vei special force camp, Lao Bao international border. Then transfer to LangCat village, wandering around village and to see daily life of VanKieus people. 6pm Dinner with the VanKieus people in the village.
